metadata.title: Sediment Profiles Data Base

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description: Includes sediment profiles of Bering Sea, Chukchi Sea, and Beaufort Sea.  Profiles consist of grain-size analysis, trace metal, and transport data.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Provide sediment information.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: Contact Source.

Use constraints: Contact Source.
